casebody.data:
Hospitality Associates v. S.I.C.O. Portable Dance Floor Company (11101)

Foti, Landau and Freedman, Js.

Argued November 3 decision released November 24, 1992 Thomas E. Stevens, for the appellant (plaintiff). Donna R. Zito, for the appellee (defendant). *916Per Curiam.

This matter is controlled by Protter v. Brown Thompson & Co., 25 Conn. App. 360, 593 A.2d 524, cert. granted, 220 Conn. 910, 597 A.2d 335 (1991), appeal withdrawn (1992).

The judgment is affirmed.
